Title: Text Page with Illuminated Marginal Medallion
Medium: ink and pigments on Italian paper with a watermark of three crescents
Description: This text page from Walters manuscript W.568 has an illuminated medallion in gold, blue, and red located in the right margin. This decorative form indicates the place where the believer performs a ritual prostration, or bowing down.
Keywords: Koran; Qur`an; Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Illumination; Manuscript; Maghreb; Scripture
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: African
